授業目的: The main purpose of this class is to develop students’ ability to write various kinds of texts. Students begin by writing paragraphs, and then short, multi-paragraph essays.　To improve fluency students will keep a journal that must be completed weekly.
到達目標: The aim of this course is to help students write clearly in English on a number of  topics and to bridge the gap between short assignments and longer research papers.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Students can only learn by being involved. The instructor will guide but it is up to the student to observe and learn.

第1回: Introduction to the course. Explanation of the syllabus. Introduction to process writing. Explanation of standard paragraph layout. General vocabulary assessment.
第3回:
Finish Unit 1 and prepare the unit writing assignment (U1P)

Timed Writing 2 (TW2)
Essay 1, Version 3 (E1V3) sharing
第9回:
